response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,500,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,400,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive unparalleled value while also maximizing my earnings. I believe this is a win-win proposition, and I look forward to discussing how this product can significantly enhance your business operations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this opportunity.", "product_price": 1400000}
